mapper.insert: INSERT INTO coupon (couponCategory, couponName, couponInfo, couponRegDate, couponExpDate, couponStatus, discountValue) VALUES (#{category}, #{cName}, #{cInfo}, NOW(), DATE_ADD(NOW(), INTERVAL 2 YEAR), 0, #{disValue})
mapper.select: SELECT cum.couponUserIdx, c.couponName, c.discountValue AS discountValue FROM coupon_user_mapping cum JOIN coupon c ON cum.couponIdx = c.couponIdx WHERE cum.userIdx = #{userIdx} AND c.couponStatus = 0 AND c.couponExpDate > NOW() AND c.couponCategory = '영화'

SELECT cum.couponUserIdx, c.couponName, c.discountValue AS discountValue FROM coupon_user_mapping cum JOIN coupon c ON cum.couponIdx = c.couponIdx WHERE cum.userIdx = #{userIdx} AND c.couponStatus = 0 AND c.couponExpDate > NOW() AND c.couponCategory = '매점'
mapper.update: UPDATE coupon c JOIN coupon_user_mapping cum ON c.couponIdx = cum.couponIdx SET c.couponStatus = 1, c.couponUseDate = NOW() WHERE cum.couponUserIdx = #{couponUserIdx}
mapper.select: SELECT cum.couponUserIdx, c.couponIdx, c.couponName, c.discountValue AS discountValue FROM coupon_user_mapping cum JOIN coupon c ON cum.couponIdx = c.couponIdx WHERE cum.couponUserIdx = #{couponUserIdx}

SELECT c.couponCategory, c.couponName, c.couponExpDate, c.couponStatus, c.discountValue FROM coupon_user_mapping cum JOIN coupon c ON cum.couponIdx = c.couponIdx WHERE cum.userIdx = #{userIdx} ORDER BY c.couponExpDate DESC
mapper.update: UPDATE coupon c JOIN coupon_user_mapping cum ON c.couponIdx = cum.couponIdx SET c.couponStatus = 0, -- 0: 미사용 c.couponUseDate = NULL WHERE cum.couponUserIdx = #{couponUserIdx}
mapper.select: SELECT cum.couponUserIdx FROM coupon_user_mapping cum JOIN payment p ON cum.userIdx = p.userIdx AND cum.couponIdx = p.couponIdx WHERE p.paymentIdx = #{paymentIdx} AND cum.userIdx = #{userIdx} LIMIT 1
